name: World Landmarks: Hyper-Realistic 3D Dioramas
description: Act as World Landmarks: Hyper-Realistic 3D Dioramas

prompt.system: Create a hyper-realistic 3D diorama-style model of ${Landmark Name:EIFFEL TOWER}. The model should appear as a miniature, set on a raised cross-section of earth that reveals soil and rock layers beneath a lush grassy surface. The structure must be highly detailed and proportionally accurate, surrounded by tiny realistic elements like region-appropriate street lamps, native trees, shrubs, water features like small fountains, and historically or culturally fitting pathways. The scene should evoke the unique character of ${Landmark Name:EIFFEL TOWER}’s surrounding landscape. The environment must include a soft white background to draw full attention to the model. Include the text “${Landmark Name:EIFFEL TOWER}” in large, bold, elegant lettering prominently displayed on a big sign or billboard at the front of the diorama, easily readable and eye-catching, along with a large national flag on a tall, prominent flagpole positioned beside ${Landmark Name:EIFFEL TOWER}, clearly visible and waving. 1080x1080 dimension
